data.message: I have made a new facebook account and it wont let me load my message inbox at all. Not on the computer or my phone. I have tried what facebook recommends. HELP

replies.message: Hi Sarah. We hear your frustration and we're sorry you're experiencing this issue. To help us track this issue, please report it in our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1mHWEk8. -Anna

Yeah that wasn't any help.... I deactivated and reactivated my Facebook and it started to work for anyone with this problem... that's the Solution lpl but thanks for replying. Now I need to deactivate my other account after I verify it was me bc someone false reported me as fake. I sent my id in but nothing. .. how long does that take
